mapper.insert: insert into attendance (class_idx, user_idx, attendace_event) values(#{class_idx},#{user_idx}, #{attendace_event})
mapper.select: select class_idx, user_idx, attendace_event, attendace_date from attendance where attendace_idx = #{attendace_idx}
select class_idx, user_idx, attendace_event, attendace_date from attendance where attendace_idx > 0 order by attendace_idx desc
